events.message: The customer reported a car collision that happened on 2024-04-30 involving significant damage to the front bumper and windshield.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the reported incident and initial documentation.
An insurance agent, John Smith, was assigned to handle this auto accident claim and coordinate the investigation.
The claimant received official acknowledgment of the claim submission along with details on next steps.
Request was sent to the claimant asking for the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a repair estimate.
Claimant submitted the requested police report, multiple photos of the accident damage, and a detailed repair estimate.
Investigation team began reviewing all submitted evidence including reports, photos, and witness statements.
Completed thorough evaluation of the incident and concluded that damage was consistent with collision details provided.
A settlement offer was prepared proposing coverage for repairs and rental vehicle reimbursement for nine days.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement terms and appreciated the prompt communication.
Claim approval was finalized, confirming that all terms agreed upon will be executed promptly by the insurer.
The approved claim payment was transferred to the claimantâ€™s account to cover vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The claim file was officially closed following confirmation that all repairs were completed and payment was received.
All claim-related documents and communications have been archived for future reference and compliance.
